name: Progress
description: All bugs, features, requests, and feedback past present and future - a comprehensive view of every item's journey through the SDLC lifecycle

stories.title: Rename Roadmap to Progress
stories.description: Change the hamburger menu item from 'Roadmap' to 'Progress' and update the modal title
acceptance_criteria: Hamburger menu shows 'Progress' instead of 'Roadmap'
Modal title says 'Progress' when opened
All references to 'roadmap' in UI text updated to 'progress'

stories.title: Display dual reference numbers
stories.description: Each item shows both the GitHub issue number (GH-XXX) and the internal API submission ID (#XXX)
acceptance_criteria: Items display format: '#123 | GH-456' when both exist
Items display '#123' only when no GitHub issue linked
Items display 'GH-456' only when no internal ID exists
GitHub number is a clickable link that opens GitHub issue in new tab

stories.title: Show description and status for each item
stories.description: Display the item description and current status clearly
acceptance_criteria: Description shown (truncated to reasonable length with ellipsis)
Status displayed with visual indicator (badge/pill)
Status options: Open, In Progress, In Review, Resolved, Closed
Status has appropriate color coding

stories.title: Add progress bar for each item
stories.description: Visual 0-100% progress bar showing SDLC lifecycle completion
acceptance_criteria: Each item has a horizontal progress bar
Progress percentage displayed (e.g., '75%')
Progress calculated from SDLC stage: Open=10%, In Progress=40%, In Review=70%, Resolved=100%
Progress bar has gradient color (red→yellow→green)

stories.title: Add category filters
stories.description: Filter buttons to show/hide items by category
acceptance_criteria: Filter buttons for: All, Bugs, Features, Requests, Feedback
Active filter visually highlighted
Filters work instantly (no reload)
Item count shown per category in filter buttons
Multiple filters can be active simultaneously

stories.title: Display accurate timestamps
stories.description: Show created date and last updated date for each item
acceptance_criteria: Created date shown in human-readable format
Last updated date shown if different from created
Relative time shown (e.g., '2 days ago') with full date on hover
Timestamps pulled from API data

stories.title: Expandable lifecycle timeline
stories.description: Click item to expand and show full lifecycle history from birth to current state
acceptance_criteria: Clicking item expands to show timeline
Timeline shows: Created → Status changes → Current state
Each timeline event has timestamp
Timeline visually shows progression (vertical line with dots)
Click again or X button to collapse

stories.title: API endpoint for lifecycle data
stories.description: Backend endpoint to return full lifecycle/history data for items
acceptance_criteria: Endpoint: GET /feedback.php?id=X&history=true
Returns array of status change events with timestamps
Includes: created_at, status_changes[], github_events[]
Handles items with no history gracefully

stories.title: Sort and search functionality
stories.description: Allow sorting and searching the progress list
acceptance_criteria: Search box filters by description text
Sort by: Newest, Oldest, Most Progress, Least Progress
Sort selection persists during session
Clear search button when search has text

stories.title: Empty states and loading
stories.description: Handle loading and empty states gracefully
acceptance_criteria: Loading spinner while fetching data
Empty state message when no items match filter
Error state with retry button if API fails
Skeleton loading for better perceived performance

notes: SDLC progress mapping: Open=10%, In Progress=40%, In Review=70%, Resolved=100%
Existing roadmap modal code can be refactored for this feature
Consider caching API response for performance
